purposeDescriptions.low: very slowly brings heavy objects to the bottom of a substrate
purposeDescriptions.mid: gently pulls the heaviest objects to the bottom of a substrate
purposeDescriptions.high: rapidly vibrates a substrate to drag the heaviest particles to the bottom of the substrate
purposeDescriptions.invLow: gently pulls the heaviest objects to the top of a substrate
purposeDescriptions.invMid: brings heavy and settled objects to the center of a substrate
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: rapidly vibrates a substrate into a homogeneous mixture
